text: Epirrita is a genus of geometer moths first described by Jacob Hübner in 1822. They are on the wing from late August to November. ==Species== * Epirrita autumnata (Borkhausen, 1794) * Epirrita christyi (Allen, 1906) * Epirrita dilutata (Denis & Schiffermüller, 1775) * Epirrita faenaria (Bastelberger, 1911) * Epirrita filigrammaria (Herrich-Schäffer, 1846) * Epirrita pulchraria (Taylor, 1907) * Epirrita terminassiae (Vardikjan, 1974) * Epirrita undulata (Harrison, 1942) ==References== Category:Operophterini
title: Epirrita
